post.text: Your potential next president on the foreign policy advisors he may (or may not) be consulting.

comment.author: Zachary
comment.text: You must be so proud of the Hispanic "protesters" at Mr Trumps rallies. Don,t you just love how they desecrate the American Flag, instigate violence and say that America belongs to them and it shouldn't matter that they come here illegally and disobey our laws. How wonderful that you pander to so much hate and civil disobedience.

replies.author: Holly
replies.text: Except they are not Hillary Supporters. They are Sander supporters. They were actually being really aggressive toward Clinton supporters as well.

replies.author: Zachary
replies.text: They are paid for by Soros who supports both Sanders and Hillary.

replies.author: Holly
replies.text: Shay Forrest Please!!!! Don't talk about what you don't know. I was voting seen them in person. A friend of mine who is a Hillary supporter was yelled and screamed at as she was going to vote

replies.author: Zachary
replies.text: I also have a friend who was there....like all anti trump "protesting" it is bought and paid for. Tell me who Hillary panders to......Hillary also staged vets against Trump. Her lies will eventually bring her to her knees.
